name: fullstackopen_part-3
description: this is part3 of the hellsinki open stack course _ with designated repo

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Phillip Radon
